Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch FEATURES 14k gold-plated brass 47mm demy hunter case with a matching curb chain Skeleton dial with roman numerals 17 jewel mechanical movement Deluxe gift box DESCRIPTION Matching curb chain. Roman numerals. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k gold plated. Brass finish. 1.85 in. Dia. A distinctive mix of warm gold-tones, a bold skeleton dial, and an outer case engraved with Roman numeral hour markers easy time-reading with the cover open or closed, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch 3558 is worth showing off. Seventeen-jewel mechanical movement ensures accurate time- keeping, while black-tone Roman numerals on a crisp white dial look sharp. This watch also has a gold-tone chain for a retro look and mineral crystal for protection against wear and tear. It arrives in a deluxe blue giftbox.
